header.title: Make your business run smoother
header.subTitle: We match Companies with top talent

card1.title: Essential
card1.body: Find your C-levels to grow your team

card2.title: Express
card2.body: Need an urgent hire? We can also match. Fast.

whyUs.title: Why Simplify-hr
whyUs.subTitle: We are obsessed with matching the best talent with their dream job

card1.title: Trust Driven.
card1.body: We gain your trust with actions over promises.

card2.title: Low and transparent fees.
card2.body: We believe that referrals for a job well done is our biggest compliment. No strings attached.

card3.title: Flexible
card3.body: Not one culture is the same. We develop a flexible plan for your individual growth goals
